sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment,useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import {Row,Col,Card,CardHeader,CardFooter,Media} from 'reactstrap'; import {Follower,Following,TotalPost} from '../../constant' import axios from 'axios' const FriendsTab = () => { const [cards,setCards] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/api/usercard.json`).then(res => setCards(res.data)) },[]) return ( {cards.map((cardItem, i) =>

{cardItem.name}

{cardItem.post}
{Follower}

{cardItem.follower}

{Following}

{cardItem.following}{"K"}

{TotalPost}

{cardItem.totalPost}{"M"}

 )} ); }; export default FriendsTab;
